title: [The Path to Enlightenment]
description: Rugged stone and metal structures sprawl across the grass that borders the path.  The dominant feature is a statue of a broad-shouldered Arkati about to strike a blade resting on an anvil.  A series of torches planted on either side of the path illuminates the area, the light gleaming off the polished metal sculptures.

Rugged stone and metal structures sprawl across the grass that borders the path.  The dominant feature is a statue of a broad-shouldered Arkati about to strike a blade resting on an anvil.  The black of the rampart wall provides a foil for the polished structures of eonake, ora and other metals.
